JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Kitchen assistant

El Mariachi is a Mexican Gastropub and we are looking for a hand in the kitchen. We are looking for the team-working candidate for our team.
We make authentic Mexican cuisine, and the applicants must have kitchen experience and have an understanding as to how a professional kitchen is run.
It is a part time job, and the salary is individually negotiated. The hours are mostly afternoons and evenings Tuesday-Saturday.
You must speak Danish or English at a good level.
Our concept is Mexican food in a Gastro Pub with great service.
We are looking for someone who would fit into our team. One who understands the importance of maintaining our standard of cleanliness.
Please attach a photo of yourself to the application.
Send your application to: job@elmariachi.dk
Write “Kitchen assistant” in the subject line.
The start date is as soon as possible.









Køkken assistent søges

El Mariachi er en Gastropub, og vi søger en køkkenassistent der har lyst til at være en del af vores team.
Vi laver original mexicansk mad og man skal have køkkenerfaring, samt forståelse for hvordan tingene hænger sammen i et travlt køkken.
Det er tale om en deltidsstilling og man får løn efter kvalifikationer.
Du skal tale godt dansk eller engelsk.
Konceptet er engelsk gastropub med mexicansk mad og med service i højsædet.
Vi vil gerne finde en der passer ind i vores team, og som forstår at holde orden og en der har styr på egenkontrol.
Vedhæft gerne et billede på ansøgningen.
Ansøg på: job@elmariachi.dk
Skriv ”Køkkenassistent” i emnefeltet.
Tiltrædelse i hurtigst muligt.
